Angelina Jolie has filed for divorce from Brad Pitt,...
...ending one of the world's most popular Hollywood romances...
According to Jolie's attorney, Robert Offer,...
...the decision was made for the health of the family.
The couple has been together for 12 years and married for two.
Jolie and Pitt have had six children together:...
...Maddox, Pax, Zahara, Shiloh, Knox and Vivienne.
